document.full_text: in 1954, charles patrick set out to purchase a boy scout uniform for his son and instead sparked the first successful civil rights legal case in birmingham, alabama.
document.title: man, 92, honored for bravery in 1954 civil rights case
lines_and_colors: in 1954, charles patrick set out to purchase a boy scout uniform for his son and instead sparked the first successful civil rights legal case in birmingham, alabama.
